abstract: Each receiver is dominating the league in his own way. And after four weeks, Johnson and Welker are putting themselves in position to overtake three of the game's greatest wide receivers.
snippet: Each receiver is dominating the league in his own way. And after four weeks, Johnson and Welker are putting themselves in position to overtake three of the game's greatest wide receivers.
lead_paragraph: There may not be two more distinctly different players in the league, but somehow, they play the same position.

headline.main: Different but Brilliant: Wes Welker and Calvin Johnson
